Trigger.name: elist/elist2 vial
Trigger.script:
local vialid = tonumber(matches[2]) local potion = line:sub(41):match("([a-z ]+)"):match("^%s*(.-)%s*$") local sips = tonumber(matches[3]) local months = tonumber(matches[4]) or "arty" local category = mm.pls_categories[potion] or "unknown"
mm.pls_vials[vialid] = {months = months, potion = potion, sips = sips} mm.pls_potions[category] = mm.pls_potions[category] or {} mm.pls_potions[category][potion] = mm.pls_potions[category][potion] or {sips = 0, vials = 0, decays = 0} mm.pls_potions[category][potion].sips = mm.pls_potions[category][potion].sips + sips mm.pls_potions[category][potion].vials = mm.pls_potions[category][potion].vials + 1
if type(months) == "number" and months <= mm.conf.decaytime then mm.pls_potions[category][potion].decays = mm.pls_potions[category][potion].decays + 1 end
mm.pls_knownstuff[potion] = mm.pls_knownstuff[potion] or 2

ScriptGroup.name: m&m Plist Sorter
ScriptGroup.script:
-- fill the data in here as necessary! mm.pls_categories = { ["oil of preservation"] = "oil", ["oil of sharpness"] = "oil", ["oil of invisibility"] = "oil", ["dragonsblood oil"] = "perfume", ["vanilla oil"] = "perfume", ["jasmine oil"] = "perfume", ["musk oil"] = "perfume", ["sandalwood oil"] = "perfume", ["a regeneration salve"] = "salve", ["a mending salve"] = "salve", ["liniment salve"] = "salve", ["a potion of healing"] = "potion", ["a potion of bromides"] = "potion", ["a potion of mana"] = "potion", ["a potion of fire"] = "potion", ["a potion of frost"] = "potion", ["a love potion"] = "potion", ["quicksilver"] = "potion", ["elixir vitae"] = "potion", ["an antidote potion"] = "potion", ["a potion of allheale"] = "potion", ["a potion of galvanism"] = "potion", ["a melancholic purgative"] = "purgative", ["a phlegmatic purgative"] = "purgative", ["a sanguine purgative"] = "purgative", ["a choleric purgative"] = "purgative", ["lucidity slush"] = "potion", ["the poison ibululu"] = "poison", ["the poison niricol"] = "poison", ["the poison pyrotoxin"] = "poison", ["the poison saxitin"] = "poison", ["the poison inyoka"] = "poison", ["the poison botulinum"] = "poison", ["the poison escozul"] = "poison", ["the poison chansu"] = "poison", ["the poison mantakaya"] = "poison", ["the poison dendroxin"] = "poison", ["the poison contortrin"] = "poison", ["the poison mactans"] = "poison", ["the poison tetrodin"] = "poison", ["the poison charybdon"] = "poison", ["the poison aleutian"] = "poison", ["the poison calcise"] = "poison", ["the poison senso"] = "poison", ["the poison mellitin"] = "poison", ["the poison haemotox"] = "poison", ["the poison crotamine"] = "poison", ["the poison anerod"] = "poison", ["the poison dulak"] = "poison", ["oolong tea"] = "tea", ["white tea"] = "tea", ["green tea"] = "tea", ["black tea"] = "tea", ["nightsweats"] = "extra", ["moonwater"] = "extra", ["glowing ink"] = "extra", ["magical sulfur"] = "extra", ["magical salt"] = "extra", ["elixir vitae"] = "extra", ["empty"] = "empty", } mm.pls_shortnames = { mana = "a potion of mana", regeneration = "a regeneration salve", choleric = "a choleric purgative", mending = "a mending salve", bromides = "a potion of bromides", frost = "a potion of frost", antidote = "an antidote potion", fire = "a potion of fire", lovepotion = "a love potion", phlegmatic = "a phlegmatic purgative", quicksilver = "quicksilver", allheale = "a potion of allheale", health = "a potion of healing", salt = "magical salt", ink = "glowing ink", nightsweats = "nightsweats", holywater = "holywater", moonwater = "moonwater", unholywater = "unholywater", sulfur = "magical sulfur", greentea = "green tea", sanguine = "a sanguine purgative", melancholic = "a melancholic purgative", liniment = "liniment", galvanism = "a potion of galvanism", empty = "empty", lucidity = "lucidity slush", }
-- script data, don't edit below this line! mm.pls_shortnamesr = {} if mm.pls_shortnames then for k,v in pairs(mm.pls_shortnames) do mm.pls_shortnamesr[v] = k end end
